oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cottage Souvenir advertisement, Geo. F. Barber
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for The Cottage Souvenir. Geo. F. Barber, Architect, Knoxville, Tenn. Late of DeKalb, Ill. 'Low Cost Houses, A Book for Every Builder. The Cottage Souvenir, No. 1.'
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: architects; architecture; advertising;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: LOW COST HOUSES. A Book for Every Builder. THE COTTAGE SOUVENIR, No. 1. Price 85 cents. THIS Book, which has become so popular of late, has been revised and enlarged, and now contains over 30 Plates of Artistic Cottages, Residences, Summer-houses, &c, &c, with plans and prices and brief hints to home builders. The prices of these Cottages range from $500.00. and upward, mostly cheap ones suited to the wants of the inquiring thousands who are searching for cheap but Artistic Cottages every day, and every class of persons can be supplied from this collection of plans. Although any shrude (sic.) builder can build direct from the plans as given in the book. I have arranged so that any builder ordering a set of working plans of any house in this book, will be allowed a commission of 10 per cent from the prices given for the working plans. THE BOOK has 56 pages, 5x7 in., printed on heavy gloss paper, bound in handsome paper cover, and will be sent to any address for 85 Cents in postal note, being less than 3 cent for each plate. M. Montgomery & Co., Builders, of Holton, Kansas, say: " It is the best collection of houses we have ever seen." Builder and Wood Worker of New York says: "Many of the designs are handsome and meritorious." Many others might be given. Order a book at once and be convinced of its merits. Send 50 Ccents (sic.) for blank specification and contract forms complete for one building. Address, GEO, F. BARBER, Architect, KNOXVILLE, TENN. Late of DeKalb, III.
